snippet: Every day at the London Games has offered riveting moments, but perhaps no single day was more crowded with drama and record achievement than Thursday.
abstract: Each day the London Games has offered riveting moments, but perhaps no single day was more crowded with drama and record achievement than August 9; the world’s fastest man and the world’s greatest half-miler ran past the finish line and into the history books; United States women's soccer finds redemption against Japan; Ireland wins its first gold medal in 16 years as women’s boxing crowned its inaugural Olympic champions; and a friendly debate ensued about exactly who was the world’s greatest athlete.
lead_paragraph: Every day at the London Games has offered riveting moments, but perhaps no single day was more crowded with drama and record achievement than Thursday.

headline.seo: Usain Bolt, Ashton Eaton Help Create a Day of Superlatives at Olympics
headline.main: Faster, Higher, Stronger: Day of Golden Drama
headline.print_headline: Faster, Higher, Stronger: Day of Golden Drama
